We had shutters installed last summer in part of our house. Tom told us when he measured that we will love them so much we will want the rest of the windows done. He was absolutely right and we just completed our second install for the rest of our windows earlier this week. To say I am pleased is an understatement. They are gorgeous and so well made. Both of our installer teams were amazing, kind and professional. Our home has been completely transformed and I would encourage anyone thinking abo

We had an excellent experience with texas Shutters & Blinds starting at their store in Frisco. The owner came to our home with fabric samples from which we found just what we wanted to replace 22 years old pull up shades. We selected the roll up shades and love how easily they go up and down. The measurements were perfect so that there is no light peeping through on the sides. The installer was in and out quickly taking the old shades with him.
Job well done and a good experience.

Best company to work with.
Ladies at front desk to technicians and installers everyone is very nice and sincere.
We are so happy with our plantation shutters.House looks so beautiful.

Hire them without any hesitation.The whole team is amazing and will take care of you.Best price and they will not haggle on small things with you.

Repeat customer for life.

Tripan Ghuman
